name: Cronie the Assassin's Mission ~ The Teddy Bear Payment
name_original: Cronie the Assassin's Mission ~ The Teddy Bear Payment
description:
A girl whose parents and siblings were murdered by bandits came to the assassination guild to make a request.
Facing the girl who had no relatives and no money, Cronie offered a helping hand.

"Without money, what equivalent can you give?"

"...This, my treasure."
The girl handed over her precious doll, and Cronie accepted the doll.

"Deal."

Cronie took the doll and headed to the bandits' stronghold.
Will assassin Cronie, can be safe and sound when facing the thief...?




  • Choose your preferred style.

    Whether it's assassinating enemies stealthily from behind or facing them head-on, it's all about reducing witness sightings.
    'As long as there are no witnesses, it's considered an assassination!!'

  • Unique and challenging mechanisms await you.

    From classic arrow traps that trigger infinite loops if triggered incorrectly to the distinctive portal maze that tests your memory!

  • Randomized treasure chest contents.

    Each time you open a chest, it's a different surprise.
    Even the same chest on the same map will yield different items, giving you that thrill of the draw!

  • Short and straightforward gameplay.

    Designed to fit the fast-paced lives of modern players, there's no lengthy plot or elaborate world-building.
    You can breeze through levels quickly, and there's no need for replaying to unlock everything—clear it once, and it's all unlocked!"






  • Stealth exploration RPG
  • H scene during battle
  • Memory Mode
  • Dialogue skip
  • Full-screen mode
  • Keys can be changed/Gamepad can be used
  • Conversation window can be hidden
